//overview_example: Looking for a software engineer to work on the next generation of Google Search, improving search quality and user experience.
overview: Superside is looking for an inspired and purpose-driven Creative Lead to take our companyâ€™s creative capabilities to the next level.
description: Superside is seeking a Creative Lead (Web) to manage the creation and output quality of projects, provide expertise in web design and art direction, collaborate with account teams and customers, mentor and manage a team of creatives, and shape creative strategies to meet customer needs. The successful candidate will have a BA or higher in Design, Creative, or similar fields, 6+ years of experience as a creative lead in a top-tier creative agency or in-house design team, a strong portfolio of work in web design and art direction, proficiency in Figma and the Adobe Creative Suite, and excellent communication skills. Join Superside and be part of a globally distributed team that delivers high-quality creative work for top brands like Meta, Amazon, and Salesforce.
requirements: BA or higher within Design, Creative, Comms, or similar fields
6+ years of experience as a world-class creative lead in an international top-tier creative agency or in-house design team in a global tech company
Strong portfolio of creative work across multiple capabilities, with a focus on Web Design, Digital Ads and Art Direction
Proficient in utilizing Figma with advanced design skills
Excellent design skills using Adobe Creative Suite
Experience in art direction and web design
Ability to quickly learn processes and multi-task projects with great detail
High level of knowledge and craft to provide top-notch design and direction
Excellent English verbal and written communication skills
Bias for action, proactive, customer-centric, and execution-driven mindset
Experience managing creative projects in their entirety and leading a high-performing team (Designers, Art Directors, etc)
